plot: Pimple poses as a crook's wife and borrows children to extort a cheque from his rich relations.
title: Mrs. Raffles Née Pimple
plot_es: Pimple poses as a crook's wife and borrows children to extort a cheque from his rich relations.
plot_en: Pimple poses as a crook's wife and borrows children to extort a cheque from his rich relations.
